name: A Couple Light Years (Jam Update Itch Version)
name_original: A Couple Light Years (Jam Update Itch Version)
description: A Couple Light Years was my entry for the #OperaGXGameJam where you play as Bfo(Player 1) and Gfo(Player 2) and see how long you survive for the high score.(Mine is 29)  CONTROLS:  Player 1(Move: UP and DOWN) (Shoot: LEFT and RIGHT)  Player 2(Move:W and S) (Shoot:A and D)
